summary_reasoning: The Council APPROVES the 'Back to Basics' approach. Restoring stationary features (Z-Score, RSI) and shortening the prediction horizon to 1 day significantly increases the probability of finding real alpha compared to the previous noisy configuration.

role_verdicts.QuantResearcher: APPROVE. Z-Score and Returns are stationary. Price is not. This is a correction of a fundamental error.
role_verdicts.RiskOfficer: APPROVE. Shorter horizon (1 day) means faster feedback loops.
role_verdicts.RealismChecker: APPROVE. Predicting tomorrow is hard, but predicting next week is impossible.

next_steps: Modify quant_backtest.py to include Z_Score, RSI, TEMA.
